name: Crazy Goat
description:
Crazy Goat is an casual-indie game that follows the story of a goat who is fed up with humans and their world.

The goat is not a peaceful creature, and it hates everything that reminds it of humans. The goat takes out its frustration by using its powerful horns to destroy anything in its path.The goat is equipped with its powerful horns, which it uses to smash through obstacles and attack anyone who stands in its way. Your mission is to pass the level having a limited time in which you should to do as much as possible damage to objects/humans.

The game is easy to learn but challenging to master, and it will keep you coming back for more as you try to beat your high score and unlock all the secrets of the goat's world.

Game Features :
- 15 levels
- Using horns
- Collecting points
- Limited time
